text: Rubén Galván (7 April 1952 – 14 March 2018) was an Argentine football midfielder. He played for Club Atlético Independiente for most of his career. At international level, he was part of the Argentina squad that won the 1978 FIFA World Cup on home soil. Galván died of cirrhosis on 14 March 2018 at the age of 65.Muere el argentino Rubén Galván, campeón del mundo en Argentina 1978 - Marca ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:Argentine footballers
title: Rubén Galván
